name: Quincy
target:
First, Last, Close, Strong,
Storm of Arrows locked to First
inGameDesc: Proud, strong and intelligent, Quincy uses his bow to perform feats of amazing skill.

range.name: Storm of Arrows
value: 100 (targets Quincy's target priority from any range)

levels.levelBody:
Description: Quincy's arrows bounce up to 3 different targets.
Effect: Shoots arrows every 0.95s that deal 1 damage and bounce onto nearby targets. Pops up to 3 bloons per arrow, and jumps up to 50 units apart from each target. Quincy starts with 50 range.

Description: Base attack bounces up to 4 targets.
Effect: Pierce increases from 3 to 4.

Description: Rapid Shot: Triple attack speed for a short time.
Effect: Unlocks Rapid Shot ability. When activated, attacks 3x faster temporarily. Cooldown is 60s and initial cooldown is 16.7s. The duration is 3.5s at Level 3 and increases by +0.5 seconds every level.

Description: Slightly longer range.
Effect: Base range increased from 50 to 52.

Description: Uses his sharp eyesight to shoot Camo Bloons.
Effect: Gains camo detection. Does not receive Camo Prioritization target option from this.

Description: Shoots 2 arrows at a time.
Effect: Gains a second arrow per shot in an angular spray.

Description: Fires exploding arrows every 3rd shot.
Effect: All arrows on every 3rd shot cause an explosion on hitting a bloon. The explosion has 1 damage and 10 pierce with a blast radius of 25.7. The arrows then keep travelling like normal arrows. This explosion increases MOAB damage with the main arrow attack. An arrow explosion counts as a burst, which means explosions are capable of damaging the same target as the originating arrow.

Description: Arrows do triple damage to MOAB-Class Bloons.
Effect: Arrows and explosions deal +2 MOAB-class damage.

Description: Base attack bounces to up to 6 targets.
Effect: Pierce of arrows increased from 4 to 6.

Description: Storm of Arrows: Covers a large area in a deadly rain of arrows.
Effect: Unlocks Storm of Arrows ability. When activated, the ability creates a damage area which lasts for 3 seconds. Each bloon repetitively takes 6 damage (plus +6 damage versus MOAB-class) during this at a 5% chance per frame (60 FPS), and can be rehit after every 0.05s. Infinite Bloons can be hit within a 100 radius from where the center is set.
If a Bloon stays in the damage area throughout the whole ability, it takes about 3 to 15 hits, causing 18~90 damage.
Only does double damage to MOAB-class bloons, unlike main attack.
Cooldown is 70 seconds and initial cooldown is 23.33s.

Description: Increased attack speed.
Effect: ~+58.33% attack speed (~0.6316x attack cooldown) (0.6 seconds per attack)

Description: Each arrow gets more popping power.
Effect: Pierce of arrows increased from 6 to 7.

Description: Small range increase.
Effect: Base range increased from 52 to 54.

Description: Arrows do quad damage to MOAB-Class Bloons.
Effect: Arrow and explosion damage to MOAB-class increased from +2 to +3.

Description: Rapid Shot becomes x4 attack speed and cooldown is reduced.
Effect: Rapid Shot increases attack speed multiplier from 3x to 4x, and cooldown reduced from 60s to 45s.

Description: More increased attack speed.
Effect: +50% attack speed (0.67x attack cooldown) (0.4 seconds per attack)

Description: Arrows last 25% longer. Fires exploding arrows every 2nd shot.
Effect: Main arrows last +25% longer. Does not affect Storm of Arrows. Now fires exploding arrows every 2nd shot.

Description: Quincy attacks faster and Storm of Arrows has reduced cooldown and 50% more arrows.
Effect: Storm of Arrows damage chance increased from 5% to 7.5%, cooldown reduced to 55s. Quincy's main attack gains +60% attack speed (0.625x attack cooldown) (0.25 seconds per attack).

Description: Shoots 3 arrows at a time, and each arrow gets even more popping power.
Effect: Pierce of arrows increased from 7 to 9. Gains a third arrow per shot in an angular spray.

Description: Quincy attacks even faster. Storm of Arrows deals more damage per arrow and fires even more arrows.
Effect: Improves Quincy's main attack speed, and greatly enhances Storm of Arrows damage per hit and rate of damage.
Storm of Arrows damage increased to 10 and does 10 extra damage to MOABs. Storm of Arrows damage chance increased from 7.5% to 10%.
+25% attack speed (0.8x attack cooldown) (0.2 seconds per attack)
